channel.title: Whonix XFCE for VirtualBox users prior build version 15.0.1.7.3: Storage Controller Setting Change Required (Failed to open a session for the virtual machine) (NS_ERROR_FAILURE (0x80004005))
channel.description:
# Affected Versions
* Whonix for VirtualBox [build version](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Build_Version) lower than `15.0.1.7.3` **→** Virtual (VM) Storage Controller [settings change required](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Troubleshooting#Failed_to_open_a_session_for_the_virtual_machine). * Whonix for VirtualBox build version [`15.0.1.7.3`](https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-for-virtualbox-15-0-1-7-3-point-release-includes-virtualbox-6-1-20-compatibility-fix/11496) (and higher) **→** no change required since fix is included.
# Symptom
> Failed to open a session for the virtual machine
> NS_ERROR_FAILURE (0x80004005)
# Impact
Whonix VirtualBox does not start until setting is changed.
# Solution
For instructions, see wiki: [Failed to open a session for the virtual machine](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Troubleshooting#Failed_to_open_a_session_for_the_virtual_machine)
# VirtualBox
This issue was introduced between VirtualBox `6.1.18` and `6.1.20`. (virtualbox.org skipped, never released VirtualBox `6.1.19`.)
Therefore before (or after) upgrading [recommended VirtualBox version](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Recommended_Version) to `6.1.20` the [settings change required](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Troubleshooting#Failed_to_open_a_session_for_the_virtual_machine).
Wiki page [recommended VirtualBox version](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Recommended_Version) takes precedence for version recommendations.
# Support
Forum discussion: https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-virtualbox-failed-to-start-ns-error-failure-0x80004005-the-vm-session-was-aborted/11471
This forum thread is closed to avoid duplication. Use above forum discussion instead.
# Related
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Recommended_Version
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stay_Tuned

item.title: Whonix XFCE for VirtualBox users prior build version 15.0.1.7.3: Storage Controller Setting Change Required (Failed to open a session for the virtual machine) (NS_ERROR_FAILURE (0x80004005))
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Affected Versions

  • Whonix for VirtualBox build version lower than 15.0.1.7.3 → Virtual (VM) Storage Controller settings change required.
  • Whonix for VirtualBox build version 15.0.1.7.3 (and higher) → no change required since fix is included.

Symptom

Failed to open a session for the virtual machine

NS_ERROR_FAILURE (0x80004005)

Impact

Whonix VirtualBox does not start until setting is changed.

Solution

For instructions, see wiki:
Failed to open a session for the virtual machine

VirtualBox

This issue was introduced between VirtualBox 6.1.18 and 6.1.20.
(virtualbox.org skipped, never released VirtualBox 6.1.19.)

Therefore before (or after) upgrading recommended VirtualBox version to 6.1.20 the settings change required.

Wiki page recommended VirtualBox version takes precedence for version recommendations.

Support

Forum discussion:
Whonix VirtualBox - failed to start - NS_ERROR_FAILURE (0x80004005) - The VM session was aborted.

This forum thread is closed to avoid duplication. Use above forum discussion instead.

Related

Whonix – 22 Apr 21

VirtualBox/Recommended Version

It is highly recommended to use the recommended VirtualBox version for use with Whonix ™. Otherwise there can be issues.

Whonix – 30 Mar 21

Stay Tuned

It is absolutely crucial to subscribe to and read the latest Whonix ™ news category 'important-news' to stay in touch with ongoing developments. This way users benefit from notifications concerning important security advisories, potential upgrade...

Read full topic
